name: Windhoek Flight Training Centre
about: Windhoek Flight Training Centre (WFTC), established in 1994, is a fully accredited flight academy and part of the Namibia Students Financial Assistance Fund (NSFAF). With over 29 years of experience, WFTC has built a reputation for trust and excellence. Our instructors are fully qualified to Namibia NCAA and SA CAA approved standards, and our aircraft are maintained to the highest technical standards. We offer a range of training programs, including an accelerated program, and cater to students from the age of 16. To qualify, students must meet specific requirements such as a psychometric evaluation, aviation medical evaluation, and achieving 26 points in Grade 12. WFTC is dedicated to teaching the next generation of pilots, providing a comprehensive aviation career journey. Choose WFTC to turn your aviation dreams into reality.
